Welcome to ExtraDock 1.36 – A New Chapter Begins!

We’re excited to announce ExtraDock 1.36, our first major release since joining the AppIt Studio family! This update marks the beginning of a new era for ExtraDock, as we set out to elevate your experience and take the app to the next level.

  • Enhanced Performance: We’ve optimized the core of ExtraDock for smoother, faster, and more reliable performance.
  • All-New Management Screen: Easily access a redesigned management interface from the menu bar, making it simpler than ever to customize your dock properties.
  • Drag Indicator: A new visual indicator makes dragging items on your dock intuitive and effortless.
  • Improved Drag & Drop: Enjoy a more responsive and fluid dragging experience throughout the app.
  • Smarter Dock Name Positioning: Dock names are now displayed more clearly and consistently.
  • Better Collapsible Dock Experience: Collapsing and expanding your dock is now smoother and more visually appealing.
  • And Much More: We’ve made numerous under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes to ensure ExtraDock is the best it’s ever been.

Thank you for being part of the ExtraDock community. We’re just getting started—stay tuned for even more exciting updates!
